Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: History
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 11, 2012

Vikings is a documentary series which sees Neil Oliver travelling to Scandinavia to reveal the truth behind the legend of the Norsemen - the Vikings - from their own point of view.
